      • setImportoTotaleDaVersare

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setImportoTotaleDaVersare(BigDecimal importoTotaleDaVersare)
        Set the importoTotaleDaVersare
        Parameters:
        importoTotaleDaVersare - the total amount to be paid.
        Not null.
        Max 12 digits, 2 decimals.
        Min value = 0.01
        Returns:
        the importoTotaleDaVersare field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPPaymentDetail, RptValidationImpl

      • setTipoVersamento

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setTipoVersamento(StTipoVersamento tipoVersamento)
        Set the tipoVersamento
        Parameters:
        tipoVersamento - technical form of payment through which it is carried out funding from the PSP based on its enumeration.
        Not null.
        Enumeration:
        • BBT
        • BP
        • AD
        • CP
        • PO
        • OBEP
        • OTH
        • JIF
        • MYBK
        Returns:
        the tipoVersamento field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        RptValidationImpl

      • setIdentificativoUnivocoVersamento

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setIdentificativoUnivocoVersamento(String identificativoUnivocoVersamento)
        Set the identificativoUnivocoVersamento
        Parameters:
        identificativoUnivocoVersamento - unique reference assigned to the payment by the Creditor.
        Not null nor empty.
        Max 35 chars.
        Returns:
        the identificativoUnivocoVersamento field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        IuvCodeGeneration, DPPaymentDetail

      • setIbanAddebito

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setIbanAddebito(String ibanAddebito)
        Set the ibanAddebito
        Parameters:
        ibanAddebito - iban of the account from charge.
        Max 35 chars.
        Must respect the following regExp: "[a-zA-Z]{2,2}[0-9]{2,2}[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,30}"
        Returns:
        the ibanAddebito field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPPaymentDetail, RptValidationImpl

      • setBicAddebito

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setBicAddebito(String bicAddebito)
        Set the bicAddebito
        Parameters:
        bicAddebito - bic of the debit bank.
        Max 11 chars.
        Must respect the following regExp: "[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"
        Returns:
        the bicAddebito field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPPaymentDetail

      • setFirmaRicevuta

        public RptDatiVersamento.Builder setFirmaRicevuta(FirmaRicevutaEnum firmaRicevuta)
        Set the firmaRicevuta
        Parameters:
        firmaRicevuta - Digital signature type code o qualified electronics it must be submitted the message of RT.
        Not null.
        Enumeration:
        • NON_RICHIESTA - 0
        Returns:
        the firmaRicevuta field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
